Waukesha.WRRD:
WRRD (AM 1510) is a radio station licensed to Waukesha and serving the Milwaukee area. The station currently airs a progressive talk format as of February 1, 2017.
The station is currently owned by Michael Crute (a co-host of one of the programs on station), through licensee New WRRD, LLC.


== History ==
The 1510 AM frequency originally signed on as WAUX and later was the original home of the WAUK call sign until February 12, 2008.
